name: Hammer Crest Idle
description:
Hammer Crest Idle is an idle RPG with a heavy focus on character customization and crafting powerful items to defeat all kinds of enemies.

Hammer Crest Idle is also available as a web game, but since Itch.io deletes web data when new updates get uploaded it's available on the following site:

https://hammercrest.github.io/

Main features include:

  • Over 300 different items to collect.
  • Craft your perfect equipment using different crafting techniques.
  • 7 different non combat professions to craft items or change existing ones.
  • Over 40 different stats to improve your character.
  • A talent tree with over 200 nodes.
  • Automation of combat so you can go do more important things than watching numbers go up and down.
  • Loads of different monsters to fight.
  • Melee, ranged and magic combat.
  • An endless dungeon in which you can push your character to the limit.
  • No microtransactions or pay to win options, you have to do everything yourself.
  • Loads of new content is being developed while you are reading this!
